title: A serif w/ Gotham?
content: I am currently working on a Church Publication that has recently been rebranded using Gotham.I'm looking for a classic serif face for the body to work with Gotham. Any suggestions?
author: willow35

comments.content:
Hehe, some people are searching for a Gotham serif partner nowadays …

On a couple of recent projects I've accented Gotham with Mrs Eaves italics. It may not be the thing for long runs of text, but the effect is extraordinarily crisp and sweet.
As I said in a recent thread: Chronicle is my favourite partner with Gotham. A nice Scotch with large x height which complements Gotham just beautifully.

"I am currently working on a Church Publication..."

I think, you need Requiem. ;)

Cheers!
